ai.name: GeoHacker
ai.desc: AI is taking over the world, this time it learned to figure out where it is in the world, we need your help in beating it, find 5 locations that will make the AI confused and win a special prize.

ai.name: On Fire
ai.desc: We heard that AI is trendy, we give you an awesome tool to run some NN layers for free. Maybe you can create GPT-5 with that. good luck!

hw.name: Baby NFC
hw.desc: I managed to sniff this data. PLZ give me credentials to hack into the building.

hw.name: Baby Tap
hw.desc: Me, master of tapping into signals, got this, hope you will use it wisely.

hw.name: Lost in Transmission
hw.desc:
Teammates said we're missing crypto challenges, but all I do is hardware. I heard crypto guys like orthogonal stuff, so here you go.

Sample rate 256k

pwn.name: Eat my bugs
pwn.desc:
Which bug tastes the best?

There is only one way to find out!

pwn.name: Junior Malware Developer
pwn.desc:
We're seeking an innovative developer to help us create an application for retrieving vital information from our retired admin's phone. This is a unique opportunity for you to support our organization in maintaining efficient operations. We'll provide an APK file as a starting point for your development. Your goal is to create an app we will install on his device that grants us access to the admin's secret notes, which are stored as admin_note.txt. Your assistance in this matter will ensure the continued security and stability of our infrastructure. Good luck, and remember to work discreetly as we prioritize confidentiality in all our operations.



The android emulator is running using: "system-images;android-30;google_apis;x86_64"

pwn.name: notes problems
pwn.desc:
You won't guess what's insideeeeee!

I haven't put any backdoor at all!

rev.name: Pipeline
rev.desc: What do you mean KISS? 🙈 Like, under the Spodek complex in Katowice? 😳

rev.name: Smart Code Recovery
rev.desc: Some guy is fiddling with this stupid AI stuff again, I think he hid something, but can't figure it out.
